What is Bootstrap ?

Bootstrap is a great, wonderful and amazing front-end framework that seamlessly views the mobile device to speed up and simplfy website development. Bootstrap provides HTML, CSS and Javascript ready-made and easy to develop.

For What is a bootstrap?

Bootstrap is a framework for building web design responsively. the web display created by bootstrap will adjust the screen size of the browser we use either on desktop, tablet or mobile device. This feature caen be enabled or disabled in accordance with our own desires. So, we can create a web for desktop display only and when rendered by mobile browser then the display of the web that we created can not adapt according to the screen. With bootstrap we can also build dynamic or static web.

How to Insert Bootstrap?

Add a link to Boostrap CSS and use the command that have been provided by Bootstrap.
